name: Medium Conditioner with Biotin
about: What it is:A moisture-rich medium conditioner, ideal for curly and coily hair textures looking for hydration, slippage, and curl definition..Hair Texture:Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Color Safe.Key Benefits:- Offers curly textures 3B-4A slip, softness, curl definition, and hydration.Highlighted Ingredients:- Jojoba Oil and Olive Oil: Provides low to normal porosity hair with moisture..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:PATTERN's Medium Conditioner is ideal for coily and curly hair needing moisture, slippage, and curl definition. It’s great for hydrating dry hair, nourishing low to normal porosity curls, and defining without weighing down. The conditioner is infused with jojoba and olive oil..Clinical Results:Based on a 63-subject consumer perception study after 1 week of use:
ingredients: - Jojoba Oil.- Aloe.- Biotin..Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycol Distearate, Steartrimonium Chloride, Cocoglucosides Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Biotin, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Honey/Mel/Miel, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire de carnauba, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Trideceth-15, Trideceth-3, Acetic Acid, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, C11-13 Isoparaffin, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage: Apply to wet hair from roots to ends. For extra dense curls or long hair, section with PATTERN Hair Clip while conditioning to ensure every strand gets the love it deserves. Use PATTERN Shower Brush or fingers to help detangle & bring curls together. Rinse thoroughly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love Pattern and committed to buying the entire line but every item in their line is simply just awful for my hair. Every product manages to tangle and dry out my hair. I used this product  product and attempted to finger detangle my hair and my hair was a tangled mess. The prior week I had the same issue and thought maybe my hair was just tangled but it was literally coming out in globs. I tried to give the product another try, being even more gentle. Washing my hair in braids, sectioning my hair to apply the conditioner and again a tangled mess. Hair coming out. I immediately grabbed a cheap inexpensive conditioner and the tangles immediately improved. Returning everything from this line

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching high and low for a conditioner that works for my hair, and I'm so glad I finally found this! My hair was very dry, and the curls were flat, and losing definition, but one wash with this and I could see immediate results, the definition in my curls was revived. I later tried it with the hydrating shampoo (which worked even better, but that's a different review), and as long as I get this result I'm going to keep buying. I chose medium because I didn't want it to be too heavy, and I think that was the right call. I love the way it feels, and I like the way it smells. I don't know if anyone will care, but to me it smells like unripened banana, which is so specific, but I think if you know what it's like to peel a banana like that, the smell that comes from the peel, it's exactly that. I like it, and I thought I'd pass that along, since the smell does stick in your hair. Tl;dr 10/10, strongly recommend for curly hair that needs more definition and hydration!
